PlayerJoined.description: Event triggered when a player joins a game.

PlayerLeft.description: Event triggered when a player leaves a game.

PlayerMessage.description: Event triggered when a player sends a chat message

PlayerAttacked.description: Event triggered when a player gets damaged

variables.attackingPlayer: username of player who attacked the unit
variables.attackingPlayerRole: role of player who attacked the unit
variables.attackingMob: id of mob who attacked the unit

PlayerDestroyed.description: Event triggered when a player dies.

variables.killingPlayer: username of player who killed the unit
variables.killingPlayerRole: role of player who killed the unit
variables.killingMob: id of mob who killed the unit

PlayerMove.description: Event triggered when player changes position

PlayerKeyboard.description: Event triggered when player presses a key

MobAttacked.description: Event triggered when a mob gets damaged

variables.entityId: id of mob who got attacked
variables.attackingPlayer: username of player who attacked the unit
variables.attackingPlayerRole: role of player who attacked the unit
variables.attackingMob: id of mob who attacked the unit

MobDestroyed.description: Event triggered when a mob dies.

variables.killingPlayer: username of player who killed the unit
variables.killingPlayerRole: role of player who killed the unit
variables.killingMob: id of mob who killed the unit

MobFeed.description: Event triggered when a mob is fed.

variables.playerId: id of player who fed the mob
variables.player: name of player who fed the mob
variables.itemType: name of item used to feed

MobTamed.description: Event triggered when a mob is tamed.

variables.playerId: id of player who tamed the mob
variables.player: name of player who tamed the mob

MobFollow.description: Event triggered when a mob starts following player.

variables.playerId: id of player that mob follows
variables.player: name of player that mob follows

MobRelease.description: Event triggered when a mob stops following player.

variables.playerId: id of player that mob follows
variables.player: name of player that mob follows

MobMount.description: Event triggered when a player mounts mob.

MobUnmount.description: Event triggered when a player unmounts mob.

BuildingAttacked.description: Event triggered when a building gets damaged

variables.entityId: id of building that got attacked
variables.entityType: type of building that got attacked
variables.attackingPlayer: username of player who attacked the building
variables.attackingPlayerRole: role of player who attacked the building
variables.attackingMob: id of mob who attacked the building

BuildingPlaced.description: Event triggered when a building gets placed

BuildingDeconstructed.description: Event triggered when a building gets deconstructed

variables.player: name of player who mined resource
name of player who crafted item

TeamMemberAdded.description: Event triggered when membed added to team

variables.player: username of player who joined team

TeamMemberRemoved.description: Event triggered when membed removed from team

variables.player: username of player who was removed

RegionEnter.description: Event triggered when entity enters a region

RegionLeave.description: Event triggered when entity leaves a region

ColonyLike.description: Event triggered when player likes colony

ColonyUnlike.description: Event triggered when player unlikes colony

WorldLoaded.description: Event triggered when world is first loaded. Useful for setting up commands such as sidebar etc.

InteractBuilding.description: Event triggered when player interacts with building

HealthChanged.description: Event triggered when entity health changed

OxygenChanged.description: Event triggered when player oxygen changed

HungerChanged.description: Event triggered when player hunger changed

StaminaChanged.description: Event triggered when player stamina changed

ScoreChanged.description: Event triggered when player score changed

ItemBuy.description: Event triggered when player buys items

ItemSell.description: Event triggered when player sells items

ItemUsed.description: Event triggered when player uses item

ItemConsumed.description: Event triggered when player consumes item

ItemDropped.description: Event triggered when player drops item

ItemPickup.description: Event triggered when player picks up item

CropHarvested.description: Event triggered when a crop gets harvested

variables.player: username of player who harvested crop

CropPlanted.description: Event triggered when a crop gets planted

variables.player: username of player who planted crop

variables.entityId: id of user who cooked food
id of user who cooked food

ArmorEquipChanged.description: Event triggered when armor equip changed

StoragePut.description: Event triggered when player puts item into storage

StorageGet.description: Event triggered when player gets item from storage

Timer:tick.description: Event triggered when timer is ticking

variables.name: name of timer
variables.remaining: number of seconds remaining before timer ends

tick.description: Event triggered when timer is ticking

variables.remaining: number of seconds remaining before timer ends

commands.description: Execute command. Can use variable names provided by the event. Variable names must start with dollar sign $ . Certain commands also accept target_selectors which starts with @ symbol. See example below

ifthenelse.description: Add a condition for another action to execute. Can use variable names provided by the event. Variable names must start with dollar sign $

timer.description: Timer that emits start/tick/end events which can be used as triggers

main.2: Craft Furnace (Press C to open craft menu)
main.6: Refill Oxygen Generator with Water Bottle
main.7: Interact OxygenGenerator to refill suit oxygen
main.10: Craft Bed and sleep to restore stamina
main.13: Collect Blood using bottle until full

extreme_cannibalism.description: Cannibalized large amount of empire soldiers

FiberSeed.description: Plant on soil to grow fiber

PotatoSeed.description: Plant on soil to grow potato

CoffeeSeed.description: Plant on soil to grow coffee

SunflowerSeed.description: Plant on soil to grow Sunflower

BlueSeed.description: Plant on soil to grow Blue Lotus

PoppySeed.description: Plant on soil to grow Poppy

WheatSeed.description: Plant on soil to grow wheat

Explosives.description: Ingredient for making grenades and missiles

Sunflower.description: Flower that is placable on pot

BlueLotus.description: Flower that is placable on pot

Poppy.description: Flower that is placable on pot

Cloth.description: Ingredient for crafting furnitures and armors

Poison.description: Ingredient for crafting poisonous items or cure

Gold.description: Currency for buying/selling goods and services

Beer.description: Restores 30 stamina. Dont Drink too much

Vodka.description: Restores 40 stamina. Make Russia great again!

Gel.description: Can be cooked to make gelatin.

AlienMeat.description: Raw Alien Meat. Cook to eat.

HumanMeat.description: Raw Human Meat. Do not eat.

AnimalMeat.description: Raw Animal Meat. Tasty if cooked.

HotDog.description: Cooked Animal Meat. Classic American Food.

SlimyMeatPizza.description: Exotic Pizza made from slime and animal meat.

Steak.description: Cooked meat. Dont care where it came from.

SlimeBroth.description: An unembellished, but edible soup. Who knew your pet could satisfy your hunger?

MisoSoup.description: A simple, but tasty soup dish. Don't burn your tongue!

Stimpack.description: Doubles Attack Speed for 15 seconds. Reduces health by 25

Lighter.description: Lit things on fire. Refill with FuelTank

NameTag.description: Change name of pet or slave

Bowl.description: Can be used to craft Soups

WaterBottle.description: Used to fill up OxygenGenerator or watering plants

SurvivalTool.description: Used for mining, and salvaging objects. Damage 2

Shotgun.description: Spread shot weapon. Each Deals Damage 12

AssaultRifle.description: Burst Weapon that shoots fast projectiles

Scar17.description: Burst Weapon that shoots fast projectiles

MolotovCocktail.description: Throw it to an area to create flames

Grenade.description: Throwable item that creates explosive damage

PoisonGrenade.description: Throwable item that emits poison to an area

AssassinsKnife.description: Looks like a radio but is actually an Assassins Knife

Katana.description: Can slice through 3 enemies at a time. Damage 10.

BlueEnergySword.description: A energy based sword forged from meteorite. Damage 25

StunBaton.description: Melee Weapon that can stun enemy. Damage 6

SpaceSuit.description: Wear this in space to avoid suffocating

CombatArmor.description: Good for melee combat. Reduces damage by 4.

RailTram.description: Fast rail transportation. Must be placed at end of Rail Track

Lattice.description: Lightweight support. Can only be placed outside asteroid area

Floor.description: Customizable floor. Double-click to change color and texture

SteelFloor.description: Allow players to move around and place additional buildings

Wall.description: Airtight structure for sealing a room

ShieldGenerator.description: Generates a force field around the entire ship. [Requires Energy]

PowerSwitch.description: Controls multiple power sources. Can turn them off/on

WaterPump.description: Generates water. Must be placed beside water source and connected via pipes

BaseStarter.description: Allows player to create a new base.

Fence.description: Door that restricts pets/bots/slaves but allows players

TimerBomb.description: Will detonate after 10 seconds of planting

TradingTable.description: Build to attract Traders to arrive.

SlaversTable.description: Build to attract Slave Traders to arrive.

ButcherTable.description: Allows you to butcher dead bodies for meat and other resources

SealedDoor.description: Door that restricts access to certain personnels only

SolarPanel.description: Generates Power using sun energy. Can only be placed on Lattice

OxygenTank.description: Stores oxygen. Must be connected via gas pipes

SmallOxygenTank.description: Stores small amount of oxygen. Connect via gas pipes

AirAlarm.description: Sets alarm when room has no oxygen

Ventilator.description: Airtight oxygen distributor. Must be connected via gas pipes

Atm.description: Withdraw and Deposit Gold to your account

Airlock.description: Airtight door that seals oxygen inside the area

ManualAirlock.description: Airtight door. No power required to operate

OilRefinery.description: Extracts oil underground and generates chemfuel

DeepDrill.description: Extracts rare resources from oil underground. Needs fuel and power.

Furnace.menuDescription: Place ore in left slot to smelt

RailTrack.description: Platform for Rail Tram to travel on

RailStop.description: Acts as Start/Stop point for Rail Trams. Must be placed at end of Rail Track

Beacon.description: Acts as spawn point for visitors

FarmController.description: Place beside soil. Informs workers which crops to grow

WebTrap.description: Trap that immobilizes enemies for 5 seconds

Bed.description: Restores player stamina. Also a respawn point

FlamethrowerTurret.description: Shoots flames at targets. Requires fuel and power.

MiniTurret.description: Sentry Turret. Needs Power and Ammunition. Damage 15

VoidRay.description: Shoots a continuous beam of focused energy. [Requires Energy]

TeslaCoil.description: Strikes Lightning Bolt to up to 4 targets

BomberTurret.description: Blast your enemies with this powerful and capable turret.

MissileTurret.description: Launches homing missile towards locked target.

Cannon.description: Long Range Cannon. Moderate Damage. [Requires Energy]

IonCannon.description: Static but powerful ranged cannon that damages anything on its path
